tool_description: Analyzes communication campaign performance across all channels, providing comprehensive metrics, trends, and actionable insights for donor engagement optimization.

campaigns.description: List of campaign IDs to analyze

metrics_to_include.description: Metrics to analyze: open_rate, click_rate, response_rate, donation_rate, cost_per_engagement, roi

segment_by.description: Segment analysis by: channel, donor_segment, time_period, or campaign_type

include_benchmarks.description: Whether to include industry benchmark comparisons

error_messages: Invalid date range: analysis_period_start must be before analysis_period_end and both must be valid dates.
No campaigns found: One or more campaign IDs in the campaigns array do not exist.
Invalid metrics: One or more metrics in metrics_to_include are not supported.
Invalid segmentation: segment_by must be one of: channel, donor_segment, time_period, campaign_type.
Insufficient data: Not enough campaign data available for the specified analysis period.
Analysis limit exceeded: Cannot analyze more than 100 campaigns simultaneously.
usage: Specify analysis_period_start, analysis_period_end, campaigns array, and metrics_to_include. Optionally set segment_by, include_benchmarks, and generate_recommendations. Returns comprehensive engagement analytics and insights.

total_campaigns_analyzed.description: Number of campaigns included in analysis

overall_engagement_rate.description: Average engagement rate across all analyzed campaigns

key_insights.description: Array of key insights from the analysis

performance_summary.description: Executive summary of campaign performance and trends
